com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.properties
Class PropertiesSupport

java.lang.Object
  com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.properties.PropertiesSupport

public final class PropertiesSupport
extends java.lang.Object

Entrypoint for customization of DataSource properties. PropertiesProvider instances should be registered/unregistered using the registerPropertiesProvider and unregisterPropertiesProvider methods. DataSource providers displaying a dialog supporting user-customizable properties should use getCustomizer(Class) method to get the properties UI.

Since:
VisualVM 1.2
Author:
Jiri Sedlacek

public <X extends DataSource> void registerPropertiesProvider(PropertiesProvider<X> provider,
                                                              java.lang.Class<X> scope)
Registers a PropertiesProvider for a concrete DataSource type.

Type Parameters:
X - any DataSource type
Parameters:
provider - PropertiesProvider to be registered
scope - type of DataSource supported by the PropertiesProvider

Type Parameters:

getCustomizer

public <X extends DataSource> PropertiesCustomizer<X> getCustomizer(java.lang.Class<X> type)
Returns an UI component to display user-customizable properties for the provided DataSource type. Use hasProperties(Class) method to check if there are any customizable properties for the given DataSource type. For no properties available the created PropertiesCustomizer is empty.

Type Parameters:
X - any DataSource type
Parameters:
type - type of the DataSource to customize
Returns:
UI component to display user-customizable properties for the provided DataSource type

openProperties

public void openProperties(DataSource dataSource)
Opens Properites window of the DataSource. The first category is selected.

Parameters:
dataSource - DataSource for which to open the Properties window

openProperties

public void openProperties(DataSource dataSource,
                           int propertiesCategory)
Opens Properites window of the DataSource and selects the provided category if available.

Parameters:
dataSource - DataSource for which to open the Properties window
